title: The moment the web started speaking Markdown
summary: Cloudflare launched a feature that serves Markdown content when requested by AI agents, cutting token usage by 70–80% vs full HTML. A signal of how internet infrastructure is adapting: the web is no longer only for humans.

title: SEO for devs: your code can make the difference
summary: A developer's guide to SEO — how CSR vs SSR impacts indexing, metadata best practices, Core Web Vitals (LCP, INP, CLS), structured data with JSON-LD, and a quick audit checklist to rank better through clean code.
